import React, {useState, Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from "../navbar/Navbar" import './Home.css' class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {books: [], isLoading:false}; } componentDidMount() { this.setState({isLoading: true}); fetch('api/groups', {credentials: 'include'}) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({groups: data, isLoading: false})) .catch(() => this.props.history.push('/')); } render() { const {books,isLoading} = this.state; if(isLoading) { return
